# Arpeggio: add2 in F# (Shape: G)

---

## Brief Presentation
The arpeggio add2 in the key of F# with a G shape is a musical entity consisting of the notes F#, A#, C#, and G. This arpeggio adds the second note of the F# major scale, G, to create a unique and dynamic sound that can be used to add color and interest to musical compositions.

## Notes and Intervals
- F# (Root)
- A# (Major 3rd)
- C# (Perfect 5th)
- G (Major 2nd)

## Musical Flavor and Genre
The arpeggio add2 in F# with a G shape adds a dreamy and ethereal quality to music. It can be used in genres like jazz, fusion, or progressive rock to introduce a sense of mystery and sophistication to a piece. The added 2nd creates tension and resolution, making it a versatile and expressive musical entity.
